description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=1/3, Mature Content=2/3. Your friend has been kidnapped by one of the worst Gang of the city. Obviously they did not know that you are a Kung Fu Master. One thing is for sure : They're gonna pay for it! Fight against boss of each level and their minions to rescue your friend. Easy to play, hard to master, be one the top online score board of the most addictive beat-them-all on XBLIG.
